<!-- Brief description of your changes -->


## Type of change
- [ ] Content update
- [ ] New page/section
- [ ] Design/styling
- [ ] Bug fix


## Checklist
- [ ] Tested locally (`npm run dev`)
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] Links work correctly
- [ ] Follows style guide
- [ ] Screenshots attached (if design change)


## Screenshots (if applicable)
<!-- Attach before/after screenshots here -->


## Review Process
1. Submit PR
2. Team reviews
3. Address feedback
4. Merge!


## Commit Message Format Reference

```
[Type]: Brief description

Types:
- Add: New content or features
- Update: Changes to existing content
- Fix: Bug fixes
- Design: Theme/styling changes
- Docs: Documentation updates

Examples:
- Add: DeFi tutorial section
- Update: Network RPC endpoints
- Fix: Broken links in overview
- Design: Apply Supra brand colors
```
